string.value: I heard there's a #p2081009# in Leafre Forest that really loves shields!

#p2081009# gets upset at those who think the shield is weak. He developed a new shield skill and said to get used to fighting with the shield if I want to learn the new skill. He told me to hunt 200 #r#o9300096##k at the training ground he prepared...\n\n#o9300096# #r#a61801##k
After I got 200 #o9300096#, #p2081009# taught me the skill known as Guardian!
Hello? Traveling Leafre forest. Very rare... Huh? You've seen me? That means you visited Leafre. #p2080002# is my brother. He is an armor seller in Leafre. \r\n#b#L0#Ah, I see!

Are you a traveler? Or adventurer? It doesn't matter. You seem to know how to use the shield. Are you interested in it? What do you think of the shield?\r\n#b#L0#I think it is a way to increase defensive power.

What? Only that? You don't mean it, do you?... Do you really only see that? A strong, perceptive warrior like yourself shouldn't Say such things! Never! \r\n#b#L0#Don't be angry. What do you think of the shield then?

A shield does not just increase your defensive power! It's much more than that! Do not solely depend on a sword, instead try to use a shield efficiently! Then you can attack easily. Many warriors aren't aware of it. That's why I, #p2081009#, made a new skill with a shield. Do you want to learn it?
This technique is called #r#q1120005##k skill. You can defend yourself from the enemy's attack. By pushing your enemy back with its power, your enemy will be stunned. Useful, isn't it?

However, you can't learn this right now. You can learn when you're familiar with using a shield. Eliminate #r200#o9300096##k in the #btraining field#k. I'l teach you the skill after that. You must have a special shield in that area.
Come back to me when you're ready to go to the training field. I'll give you #b#t1092041##k in the training field.
You don't want to? If you look down on a shield, you'll have trouble someday.
Wow! Are you already done with #o8140103#? You have serious talent! I'll teach you the Blocking skill. Plus, I'll give you a shield that you can use with this new skill.
This will enable your shield mastery. Try to use a shield more often! Show how strong the shield is!
Haven't you eliminated #b#o9300096##k? If you get used to the shield, it will be much easier to kill Kentaurus monsters.
